id.description: ID is the unique identifier for this connector.

name.description: Name is the human-readable identifier for this connector, which will be shown to end users when they're authenticating.

type.description: Type is the type of the IDP ex. `saml`, `oidc`, `github`.

configVersion.description: ConfigVersion must be incremented every time a connector is updated, to avoid concurrent updates conflicting.

jsonConfig.description: This is left for backwards compatibility, but we want users to use the config defined below.

config.description: Config is the configuration for the upstream IDP, which varies based on the type. We make the assumption that this is either yaml or JSON.
